casebody.data:
Lynch, Respondent, v. Metropolitan El. R. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. March 9, 1891.) Appeal from special term. Action by Lawrence Lynch against the Metropolitan Elevated Bailroad Company and another. From a judgment in plaintiff’s favor, defendants appeal.

Argued before Sedgwick and Dugro, JJ.

Davies <£- Rapallo, for appellants. Charles Gibson Bennett, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
